nodes.text: A mining station was located on an asteroid and was later used by pirates during the Galactic Civil War, who established a base there that consisted of a hangar and landing field. Around 3 ABY, the Rebel Alliance's Seventh Division regrouped at a predetermined rendezvous point nearby. After learning the existence of the pirates, and realizing the threat to the safety of the rendezvous point, the Alliance sent Red Squadron to destroy it.
